turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I have two right feet.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Good.  I have two left....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Our little island seems to agree with you....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I have my own little island.

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: But it gets cold in winter....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I tried winter once.  Burlington, Vermont.  Flew a run to New York.  I have a bone in my foot that still hasn't thawed.  When I was a small boy....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: That's hard to imagine....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I dreamed about always being warm... Stay a while....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I could take some time off....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You're always taking time off....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I like to travel....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I'll nick the boss' plane again....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I borrow it without telling him....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Won't you get in trouble...?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Only if he finds out... It's a short hop to the Caribbean.  We could take a few days....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: There must be plenty of women who would be glad to go....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: There are...I'm tired of one-way conversations....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I have this overwhelming desire to kiss you, Ellen Brody.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Why?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Because it wouldn't occur to you to know why.  Blushing suits you....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'm sorry...I....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: There's nothing to be sorry about.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: The whole idea is preposterous....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You sure you don't need glasses?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: My vision is perfect....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I tried to tell you...I tried....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Give me a hand here for Christ's sake....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I can't....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Yes you can....

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: They had them on the big one....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I have coffee in the thermos.

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: I'm too young for coffee.  Can I drive the plane?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I'll get it back next time.

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: How come it bumps up and down when there's no road?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: The wind does that.  Ever been to the Bahamas before?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Want to go for a little ride?

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: I do....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I don't know why I fish here...Never catch anything...Must be a sign under the water...'Beware, Hoagie's here....'

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: You're the man who drives the plane.

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: You the architect?

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: I'm the artist.  Like my mother.

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: Hurry!

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Just like that?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Can you keep a secret?  Something no one else knows?

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: Yes I can....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I own the airplane.  I can do whatever I want.  I'm the boss.

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: It was theirs anyway.  I 11 buy us all a drink....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: We'll buy you one.  We're having a party....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I hope she's a good sailor....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: A shark attacked Thea and some kids...She's going after it....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: You're going after her in that? You're crazy...It'll take all day in that bathtub....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You got a better idea...?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: When we find her we'll radio her position...The Coast Guard will pick her up.  Don't worry....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: She'll be all right, partner.. She'll never find it.  We couldn't....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: What do you mean, it'll find her?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: She said it was coming....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Grab your socks....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You sure you know how to do this.

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Hell, no.  What kind of pilot do you think I am...?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Hell, that wasn't half bad.. Get going...I'll keep it busy....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: It'll come for the plane.  It's attracted to metal.  The electro- magnetic impulse....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Will you get the bloody hell out of here....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: What say we get the hell out of here, Ellen Brody. ...

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Get her started....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Maybe the plane gave it indigestion....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: They spend half their lives looking for food and the other half eating it   They don't care what it is....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Keep it steady....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Aye, aye, Captain....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Jake tells me you're going to have to fly for the rest of your life to pay off what you lost at the crap table....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Good news travels fast....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Mind if I cut in?  Your date's lonely....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: The world would be a better place if more sons danced with their mothers.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I want you to leave her alone.  I don't want you involving her in....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: What's that....?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What do you deliver on all those charters you...?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I fly elephants for smugglers....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Can't this thing go any faster?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Any faster and it'll turn into a flying Cuisinart and dice us into oblivion....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Come on, Hoagie....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: All you passengers are the same.... Complain...Complain....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What happened?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Nothing!  What the hell are you doing down there?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: The damn thing is going to have our asses....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: It needs more time to charge.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Matt?

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: Tell Thea I'm sorry....

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: I don't know what the hell to say....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You don't have to say anything, Matt ...I know how you feel....

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: Yeah....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Still chasing fish?

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: Still tagging conch?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: We'll be done pretty soon....

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: Tricky little devils, aren't they? How's the degree doing?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Inch by inch....

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: How's Ellen?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: She has good days and bad...I don't know....

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: She's a tough lady....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I wish there was something I could do....

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: She's had a lot to deal with...She needs time....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Would you talk to her?  She's got it in her head that the shark came for him.  She still blames it for my father's death....

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: Oh, boy....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: The stuffing came out of the pillow he was wearing....

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: Feathers all over the place....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: It was like having snow in the house ...Jesus, I miss them.

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: Let me speak to Ellen....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'll get her.  Have a good Christmas, Matt....

turns.speaker: HOOPER
turns.text: You too, Michael....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Stop farting around....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Stop busting my hump....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Try the area around the wreck....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: How many...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Will you leave me alone...?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You tagging them...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'm separating the ladies from the gentlemen....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You moved any slower, you'd grow roots...We've got a schedule...shake it, man....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: The females have eggs....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: We'll pass around cigars....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: We're being paid to see where they go...How they propagate....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: If we had some decent money, I'd be able to read their temperatures... Study their motor systems....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: If you'd leave me alone, I'd be able to get my work done....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I know how to tag a damn conch....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: The readings suck....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Maybe it's the tags that suck....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I made them, man....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I stuck them on, man....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You didn't stick them on right....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: If you made them right, it wouldn't happen...They leak....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: A blind man could find more conch on a mountainside....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You couldn't find your ass with both hands....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You leave me high and dry...You come back looking like a zombie....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Hey!

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Shouldn't pick on that.  Sorry.  I'm sorry about your brother....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Yeah, well, just stop yelling.

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I missed you, is all.  It's dull around here working alone...Smelling all that sweet cologne....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Put me down....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: They won't fight with me....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Put me down, damnit....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Maybe I missed you too....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Where the hell's the beer...?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Bad boy....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I didn't do it on purpose....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Sharp shirt, Jake....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: May your sex life be as busy as your shirt....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Office of Naval Research has some money....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Forget it....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Money is money....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: They put bombs on dolphins....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I know a guy who got money from them to study eels....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: A regular tropo...Spend the rest of your life in a bathing suit, living off nickel and dime grants.  You want to be a bum all your life, be my guest.  Not me.  I'm not growing old chasing snails and dying from terminal crotch rot....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: It's not a bad life, Jake....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You're afraid of the competition out there....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: He's just trying to keep you from disappearing up your own....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You're nothing but a bunch of goddamn romantics.  You're never going to amount to anything.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: How many?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Stop busting my hump....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Oh, it's okay for you, but not for me....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I've struck the mother-lode.  I'm counting... spade work....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I wish you wouldn't say that....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Spade's a garden tool....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Trouble with you, Jake, is you have no sense of humor....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Holy shit!

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You guys are making this into some- thing that just isn't so... It's just a shark.  A great big bloody wonderful shark.  Don't say anything to anyone. The locals find out they'll panic. They'll want to kill it.  We've got us a great white, Michael. We're going to do us some real research....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Don't say anything about this to my mother....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Where is everybody?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Down here....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What happened to Clarence and...?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Gave them the day off....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What for?  We've got a job to finish ...Why are you making the monitor?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: As the sun slowly sets in the West, we bid a fond farewell to the family of conch....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: We're out of money, partner.. We wrap it up, write it up and turn it in... How come your heart sounds stronger than mine?  You got two of them...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: We don't write up anything until we're done....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Okay.. .we're done, man....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: When we got the grant....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: When I got the grant.....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: When I signed on....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: When I invited you...

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: We got it together, Jake....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Okay...we got it together....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: We have at least three months' work left.  We can't write a report...We don't know enough....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: We've got a rare bird here, Michael. Great whites don't come to the Bahamas.  There's never been one down here before.  I'm not just going to let it swim away.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: My name goes on that report.  It's a half-assed job, I don't get my doctorate.  Neither do you....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: The shark will get it for us.

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I thought we were planning a long rosy future together.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: So did I....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I don't know shit about electronics....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You don't know shit about anything. Time you learned....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You sure you've done this before?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Lots of times....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: And it's always worked?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: So far..

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: What are we getting out of this old bucket?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What she's got.  Nine knots....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Shit....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: How long have you known Hoagie?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: How long have you known Hoagie?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: What the hell does Hoagie have to do with this?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: How long?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: As long as he's been here....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Bring her to starboard.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: How long has he been here...?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Who?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Hoagie.

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I don't remember.  One day he was just here....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What do you know about him?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What's so funny about that?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You think he's not good enough for her?  You're right.  If she was my mother, I'd send her home right now.

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Bring her about.  We're headed in the wrong direction....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Half the pilots down here fly drugs ...He's always going off....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Half don't...Bring her about....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I am...You must know something about him....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: He gambles...He likes a good time...I see him around....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I hear he flies a lot of private charters....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: We lost it....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Maybe the gear crapped out....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: If you hadn't been gassing about Hoagie....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Maybe it's gone....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I've got about a half dozen...I'm going to tag them.  You hearing anything?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Nothing.. But stay within a quarter mile...I've got a three-mile radius on the monitor.  If he comes back I'll hear him.  You'll have time to get up.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'm coming...How close is it?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Close...I don't know...Just get the hell....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: It's my turn in the barrel, man....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You fall off a horse, you get right back on or you don't ride again....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I don't like it....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I didn't ask you to....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: What about Carla's gig?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'm going down, Jake....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: She's not going to like it....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You getting a reading on them?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I live to hear the sound...You all right?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What about the monitor...?  You getting anything on the shark?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Nothing...Hey Michael...You know I was thinking about yesterday.  Maybe all that was wrong was he was hungry....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: How come only me?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Maybe he only likes white meat....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Funny, Jake...Funny.

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Just trying to be helpful....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: A Moray eel...A Moray eel....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: 'It was so ugly...It was so big....'

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: 'A Moray eel....'

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: 'Snuck up on me....'

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: 'It got us in hot water...We should have been there for Carla....'

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Shit....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Don't be so down, man.  Money's gone...Shark's gone...We're back to conch...We've got it made....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Shove it....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You'll be the eternal tropo...The old man and the sea...Know the words to this one?  'Oh, the shark has pretty teeth, dear, and he shows them pearly white...'

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Stop that!

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You don't like my voice...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I don't like the song.

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Tough shit.  'When the shark bites with his teeth, dear...'

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You told me what?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Screw you, Jake....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Holy Christ....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Mom....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: What the hell are you doing?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I've got to get to her....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You jump, you'll kill yourself....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: If it works, if we can get it inside the bastard and set it off, it'll shock the hell out of it.  We'll need a slave switch to set it off. Pull the dry cell out of the radio.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Anybody ever tell you you're nuts....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: All the time....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: It'll work....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Theory, partner...If it responds to external electrical impulse, it might respond to one coming from inside it...Confuse it...Drive it away....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: If we're real lucky, it'll eat itself....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Wait for the sucker to charge, then hit the switch.  Just like taking a picture.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: The big picture...If we can't get him to swallow it, we'll shove it up his....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I forgot my rubber gloves.  Let's do it.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Your equipment has crapped out again....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: My equipment doesn't crap out....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'll do it, Jake.

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: No way....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: It's my fault...I have to....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: We need it to eat electronics, man ...Not you.  Get it on me....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Jake.

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I'm the one who wanted to study it....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Listen to Carla...Marry me...I'm tall, dark and handsome...two out of three ain't bad....

turns.speaker: LOUISA
turns.text: Don't flatter yourself....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: How much longer?  This is supposed to be your party.

turns.speaker: LOUISA
turns.text: In a few minutes....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I knew there was a reason I could afford this.  To the woman of my dreams.. Who grows more beautiful....

turns.speaker: LOUISA
turns.text: Here it comes....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Who grows more beautiful....

turns.speaker: LOUISA
turns.text: Here comes the cow ca-ca....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: More beautiful with each passing minute...

turns.speaker: LOUISA
turns.text: I told you....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Now wait a minute... I'm being serious here....

turns.speaker: LOUISA
turns.text: Oh, Jake...

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Happy birthday, darling. ...

turns.speaker: LOUISA
turns.text: Don't go weak in the knees on me tonight....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: I just want to make an honest woman of you....

turns.speaker: LOUISA
turns.text: I'm not going to marry you until you straighten out your life and your hair.

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: She's in management....

turns.speaker: LOUISA
turns.text: I'm training to....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Manage the whole damn place some day. I'm looking forward to living in the style to which I would like to become accustomed....

turns.speaker: LOUISA
turns.text: I'd have to manage a nookie parlor to do that....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Woman has taste....

turns.speaker: LOUISA
turns.text: When he has a pillow over his head....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You want to be careful how you talk to me... I'm about to become famous...You should see....

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: That bad, huh?

turns.speaker: POLLY
turns.text: We're out of decaf...We're out of petty cash...And we're out of requisition forms....

turns.speaker: POLLY
turns.text: You have the safety talk at school, one o'clock tomorrow....

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: Anything to do before I go home?

turns.speaker: POLLY
turns.text: That man keeps calling about his training film.  I can't convince him we don't have a S.W.A.T. team.

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: Good night, Polly....

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: Where's Lenny?

turns.speaker: POLLY
turns.text: Gone to Ben Masters' place.  Cow tipping.

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: Cow tipping?

turns.speaker: POLLY
turns.text: Claims kids come around at night and tip over his sleeping cows.  They're not giving milk.

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: I'll take care of it.

turns.speaker: POLLY
turns.text: Deputy Brody will take care of it personally.

turns.speaker: JACK
turns.text: Did you like that, Mama?

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: JACK
turns.text: I'm glad of it. I'd rather please you than anybody I know of. Oh, darlin', will you give me something?

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: JACK
turns.text: You'll never guess. Shut your eyes, Mama. Shut 'em for little Jakie. Ha. I'm gonna steal something.  Ha, ha, ha, ha. I'll give it back to you some day, too, you see if I don't. Mama, darlin', if I'm a success in this show, well, we're gonna move from here. Oh yes, we're gonna move up in the Bronx. A lot of nice green grass up there and a whole lot of people you know. There's the Ginsbergs, the Guttenbergs, and the Goldbergs. Oh, a whole lotta Bergs; I don't know 'em all. And I'm gonna buy you a nice black silk dress, Mama. You see Mrs. Friedman, the butcher's wife, she'll be jealous of you.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Oh no--

turns.speaker: JACK
turns.text: Yes, she will. You see if she isn't. And I'm gonna get you a nice pink dress that'll go with your brown eyes.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: No, Jakie, no. I-I-I-

turns.speaker: JACK
turns.text: What? Whatta you mean, no? Who is -- who is telling you? Whatta you mean, no? Yes, you'll wear pink or else. Or else you'll wear pink.  And, darlin', oh, I'm gonna take you to Coney Island.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Yeah?

turns.speaker: JACK
turns.text: Yes, I'm gonna ride on the Shoot-the-Chutes. An' you know in the Dark Mill? Ever been in the Dark Mill?

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Oh, no. I wouldn't go ...

turns.speaker: JACK
turns.text: Well, with me, it's all right. I'll kiss you and hug you. You see if I don't.  Now Mama, Mama, stop now. You're gettin' kittenish. Mama, listen, I'm gonna sing this like I will if I go on the stage. You know, with this show. I'm gonna sing it jazzy. Now get this ...

turns.speaker: AMANDA
turns.text: As I said, Sergeant, you nearly ran into <u>me</u>? What's the problem?

turns.speaker: BERLIN
turns.text: I'm afraid it's the "van" again.

turns.speaker: AMANDA
turns.text: The van?

turns.speaker: BERLIN
turns.text: Is it your vehicle?

turns.speaker: AMANDA
turns.text: No, my mother's .. You better stop in .. I'm just here to feed the cat.

turns.speaker: BERLIN
turns.text: I'm sorry to worry you with this, but we had a real serious robbery, and we- 're chasing a white V.W. van? You guy came up an the computer, so as a matt- er of routine we have to check. Could you tell me who's driven it recently?

turns.speaker: AMANDA
turns.text: Only me and Mom ..

turns.speaker: BERLIN
turns.text: How about any guys on your staff?

turns.speaker: AMANDA
turns.text: We only got one .. He doesn't drive.

turns.speaker: ROSS
turns.text: Did you bring it with you?

turns.speaker: BERLIN
turns.text: I hope I'm not intruding?

turns.speaker: ROSS
turns.text: Be my guest. What you got?

turns.speaker: BERLIN
turns.text: Old guy, offed himself with a knife. I can't find the knife.

turns.speaker: BERLIN
turns.text: I dunno .. Guess the dozer musta shifted him? You need some hands up here to look ..

turns.speaker: ROSS
turns.text: You heard. Look for the knife.

turns.speaker: BERLIN
turns.text: No, Sir. I haven't started till Monday. I'm a "tourist."

turns.speaker: ROSS
turns.text: "Welcome to Eureka."

turns.speaker: ROSS
turns.text: Mr Blattis, of our local news- paper. You sure it's a suicide?

turns.speaker: BERLIN
turns.text: Uh huh .. He's well rehearsed ..
